Quotes: We turn toward God only to obtain the impossible.
Author: Albert Camus

Quotes: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: God works wonders now and then;Behold a lawyer, an honest man.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quotes: Jesus is the God whom we can approach without pride and before whom we can humble ourselves without despair.
Author: Blaise Pascal

Quotes: Shakespeare was the great one before us. His place was between God and despair.
Author: Eugene Ionesco

Quotes: God hangs the greatest weights upon the smallest wires.
Author: Francis Bacon

Quotes: It's wonderful to climb the liquid mountains of the sky. Behind me and before me is God and I have no fears.
Author: Helen Keller

Quotes: Before the throne of the Almighty, man will be judged not by his acts but by his intentions. For God alone reads our hearts.
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes: If God wants us to do a thing, he should make his wishes sufficiently clear. Sensible people will wait till he has done this before paying much attention to him.
Author: Samuel Butler
